main: ^(truth) I am Akeru and I have come to speak to your king
^(lie) I am Greg and I am a traveling jester here to entertain the king

c-0: ^What do you have to say to the mighty BLUE KING!
^I wish to aquire his crown so that we may save humanity
^I wish to challenge him for the right to rule the blue kingdom
^Our king has never parted with his crown but you may enter and make your case

c-1: ^Oh you are a jester huh? Where is your funny hat then?
^I was ambushed by wolves in the woods they ... ate it

c-0: ^That hat is not nearly funny enough. Kill the imposter
c-1: ^My appologies sir jester. I have heard there are wolves in the deep woods. You may pass
